info.name: Remote Print Management
info.detail: Properly configured remote applications can send graphics to RoboPaint for automatic printing, only with this mode open can they be run.

api.disabled: The SVG import API is currently disabled. Enable it in settings and then click the button in the RoboPaint GUI.
api.busy: Cannot add to queue during ongoing print job.
api.readyfail: Ready state not set, Mode not open or available

button.readytitle: Enable this when you're ready to start processing the print queue.
button.noresettitle: If enabled, readiness checkbox above will not be reset after a print, allows for immediate queue processing.

status.cancelled: Remote printing spooling and printing cancelled.
